name: Raistlin 2
description:
Raistlin comes back with more powers but limited mana quantity!

Escape through the dungeons using your limited spells wisely. Avoid the water!

Controls:

- Move with ARROWS/WASD

- Mouse. Left: create barrier/platfor, cost 1/100.

- Mouse Right: throw fireball, cost 30/100

Levels:

- Easy: 100 mana qty.

- Medium: 70 mana qty

- Hard: 40 mana qty
